title: Help
body: Is there a length limit or something because I can't post a message to the boards. I just need help riot removed my last one due to it being in the wrong sub section though I believe this is now the right one.

replies.body: As far as I've come to realize in my time on the boards, there isn't a character/post length limit. I've seen some preeeeeeeeetty long posts that are several pages long in my days here.
